As the magic turned the aboleth's brain to dust, I inhaled deeply of the leavings, and a nearly infinite roll of years began to unspool before my eyes. I saw a red sun hanging in the sky over a desolate land, where the ruins of a castle slowly sank into a sea of dust. Will there come a day when my mind is no longer my own?
